ModMetaData.name: Just Copy
ModMetaData.author: iforgotmysocks
ModMetaData.description:
v1.2.1
Quick and simple qol mod adding new buttons to the outfit / food restriction / drug schedule menus, allowing you to create a new option from an existing entry and a second one to move the selected restriction to the top, so it'll be used as the new default for new pawns. New button's positions now configurable in mod options.
Credits Preview image by Shakesthespeare
